> **Anfet** (Tigrinya) means **Direction**.

## How this book is organized
- Parts move from *self* → *skills* → *work* → *money* → *relationships* → *society* → *long game*.
- Each chapter has: **Aha moments**, **Failure lessons**, **Rules of the game**, **Exercises**, **Stories**.
